formalpara.title: Figure 3. Summary of MEX-3 and PAL-1 localization data in wild-type, mutant, and RNAi depleted embryos
formalpara.para: These data show that MEX-3 localization and MEX-3 activity can be modulated independently, thus parallel pathways regulate the pattern of PAL-1 accumulation. Adapted from Huang et al. (2002).
